price: 21. Kani waa Maalinka kala baxa ee aad beenin jirteen.
arabic: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: hādhā yawmu al-faṣli alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
